data.title: Virtual Prostgraduate Open Event

data.title: Careers in Computing Sciences
data.description: Employers, past UEA CMP students, and other interesting people all working in the computing and technology sector in one place! There will be talks about the sector, panels, and brilliant opportunities to find out more about live jobs, placements and internships.
